plot: Farhad works on some highly controversial tests. When he suddenly absconds with some results to a place named Heaven, his wife doesn't know the reason. She goes to Heaven to find Farhad - but she finds him in Hell.
title: Az Tehran Ta Behesht
plot_es: Farhad works on some highly controversial tests. When he suddenly absconds with some results to a place named Heaven, his wife doesn't know the reason. She goes to Heaven to find Farhad - but she finds him in Hell.
plot_en: Farhad works on some highly controversial tests. When he suddenly absconds with some results to a place named Heaven, his wife doesn't know the reason. She goes to Heaven to find Farhad - but she finds him in Hell.
